      • normalizeDistance

        public double normalizeDistance(int dist)
        Used to normalize distances. Done via min-max normalization. Supposes that minimum possible distance is 0. Supposes that the maximum possible distance is 150.
        Parameters:
        dist - Distance to be normalized
        Returns:
        Normalized distance
